abstract: HSBC appointed Frank Slevin as its head of global banking, Asia-Pacific, a move aimed at building up its investment banking in the region. Mr. Slevin, who was formerly the chief operating officer of Citigroup’s Asia-Pacific investment-banking unit, will report to the heads of corporate and investment banking and markets and to the co-heads of global banking.
